title: Malibu C Crystal Gel Hair Treatment
description: Preps hair for all chemical services. Removes buildup & discolouration. Saves time & prevents re-dos. Malibu Crystal Gel. The original natural wellness treatment, this must-have for elite stylists worldwide is a patented vitamin complex that naturally primes hair to provide a crystal clear canvas completely receptive to ensure brilliant services. Crystal Gel Professional Normaliser is an In-Salon treatment that is your best choice for removing minerals from your clients hair. Mineral or medication deposits can cause or contribute to inconsistent results, grey coverage challenges, rapid colour fade and colour that fades Off-Tone.
